content: Xingyu Pan is an undergraduate student of software engineering at Nanjing University. He joins the LAMDA group led by Prof. Zhi-Hua Zhou, under the guidance of Prof. Ming Li.
summary: Xingyu Pan is an undergraduate student of software engineering at Nanjing University. He joins the LAMDA group led by Prof. Zhi-Hua Zhou, under the guidance of Prof. Ming Li.
title: Xingyu Pan

content:
An Android App for reciting GRE words.
 It helps the customers manage words and scientifically makes a study plan according to The Ebbinghaus Forgetting Curve.
 It is a coursework for Human-Computer Interaction Systems. And I completed the part of making the study plans.
summary: An Android App for reciting GRE words
title: WhaleWord

content: A platform for patent trading based on blockchain. It provides services including patent trade, patent loan and insurance and patent automated evaluation. It is a competition project. The group of the project consists of 23 people and I am the product manager, who is responsible for the requirement design and the development of blockchain structure.
summary: A platform for patent trading on blockchain
title: IPNET

content: A platform for data annotation labeling. The data annotation requester publishes images and videos on the platform, and the platform automatically labels, and then sends the lower recognition rate data to the workers to label. It is a coursework for Software Engineering and Computing III. And I completed front-end and optimize the recognition algorithm.
title: UTag
